articles.title: Living Robots Called Xenobots Can Now Reproduce, Scientists Say - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Let’s just agree not to plug them into Skynet, okay?
articles.content:
Scientists who created the first living robots have revealed that the organisms, known as xenobots, can now reproduce, according to their study.

articles.title: Singapore now Asia's priciest city as inflation adds to Omicron fears - The Straits Times
articles.description: New Economist Intelligence Unit report puts Singapore up two places in its index to second globally.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: Gong Yoo joins Instagram, finally, Entertainment News - AsiaOne
articles.description: Probably inspired by his good friend Lee Jung-jae, Korean actor Gong Yoo has also, finally, joined Instagram. The 42-year-old oppa launched his official account on Wednesday (Dec 1) morning and in just seven hours, pulled in 633,000 followers. His first post …
